examples: He is an authority on the precursors of suicidal behavior.

definitions.definition: Likely to commit , or to attempt to commit, suicide .
examples: After losing his job, his wife, and his leg in a single week, he became suicidal .

definitions.definition: Highly likely to certain to result in the deaths of the participants; dangerous or reckless to such a degree as to be tantamount to suicide for those taking part.
labels: of a voluntarily-chosen course of action
definitions.label_groups: of a voluntarily-chosen course of action

examples: His driving habits are utterly suicidal .

secondary_definitions: ( of a person ) Likely to commit , or to attempt to commit, suicide .

( of a voluntarily-chosen course of action ) Highly likely to certain to result in the deaths of the participants; dangerous or reckless to such a degree as to be tantamount to suicide for those taking part.
